node._create_table_statement: CREATE TABLE `recording` ( `recording_id` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `recording_of` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `appears_in` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `link` char(255) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL, `read_by` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', PRIMARY KEY (`recording_id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_unicode_ci
node.title: recording
